issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: CBO
components.description: All issues dealing with Hive's cost based optimizer and its interaction with Optiq

fields.summary: CBO produces annoying exception message and wraps exceptions too much

comments.body: [~ashutoshc] tiny patch, can you please -+1- review?

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12673469/HIVE-8390.patch

Update patch to also remove these intermediate exceptions

1) Doesn't print exception when column stats are missing; the column stats missing statement is still printed from the callee.
2) Removes some exception wrapping in Hive.
3) Unwraps some wrapping added by Calcite via reflection.
